definition: surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image
clique/school/group/faction/to dispatch/to send/to assign/to appoint/pi (Greek letter Ππ)/the circular ratio pi = 3.1415926/(loanword) pie

sentences.english: Post-impressionism reflected a number of the same attitudes as symbolism in literature.
sentences.chinese: 後印象派反映了大量與文學象徵主義相似的態度。

sentences.english: What is the meaning of the "impressionism"?
He also had a profound influence on 19th century European impressionists .
sentences.chinese: 他對19世紀時歐洲印象派也產生了深遠影響。

sentences.english: Sotheby's Impressionist sale had a poor showing last week.
sentences.chinese: 蘇富比上週的印象派畫作拍賣表現疲軟。

sentences.english: The Impressionists ignited a revolution with their use of color and movement.
sentences.chinese: 印象派畫家用顏色和行動點燃了繪畫界的一次大革命。

sentences.english: The Impressionist Renoir is quoted as saying “No shadow is black.
sentences.chinese: 印象派畫家雷諾阿曾言“沒有陰影是黑色的。

sentences.english: The particular effect of the painting brushwork is the exploration of the impressionists towards the format language.
sentences.chinese: 獨特的筆法效果是印象派畫家對形式語言的探索。

sentences.english: Water ripples resemble an impressionist painting in Costa Rica.
sentences.chinese: 哥斯達黎加的層層水波，頗似印象派繪畫。

sentences.english: He was a post-impressionist painter whose early works, like The Potato Eaters, portray peasant life in somber, dark colors.
sentences.chinese: 他的早期作品說明他是一名後印象派畫家。

sentences.english: It looks like an impressionistic painting.
sentences.chinese: 它像是一幅印象派畫作。

sentences.english: Her paintings combine the Chinese ink and wash style with Western impressionism.
sentences.chinese: 她的作品融合了中國水墨畫和西方印象派的風格。

sentences.english: Van Gogh was undoubtedly influenced by the Impressionism that swept the city's art world.
sentences.chinese: 梵高顯然深受當時襲捲巴黎藝壇的印象派畫風影響。

sentences.english: Paul Cezanne was an important postimpressionist painter and the father of modern painting.
sentences.chinese: 塞尚是後印象派的重要畫家，現代繪畫之父。

sentences.english: The style of his novels is impressionistic.
sentences.chinese: 他那些小說的風格是屬於印象派的。

sentences.english: He ever received the baptism of Impressionist in France admission to Sharon and enjoying reputation in Paris.
sentences.chinese: 他曾在法國接受印象派的洗禮，入院沙龍，飲譽巴黎。

sentences.english: The canvas Yin Xiang Ri Chu is the cornerstone of impressionistic paintings.
sentences.chinese: 《印象日出》這幅油畫，是印象派繪畫的奠基石。
